name: Arista-cpu-cacti
tagline: Arista CPU cacti template (AMD Athlon(tm) 64 X2 Dual Core Processor 3600+)
body:
###Requirements
* Arista SW :)
* cacti 0.8.8b+
* PHP >= 5.4.0
* Net-SNMP
* working ip connection to Arista switch.

###Instalation

1. Install snmp (apt-get install snmp).
1. Install snmp-mibs-downloader (apt-get install snmp-mibs-downloader).
1. Import Templates in cacti (/templates_import.php).
1. Move arista-sensors.php into /scripts/
1. Add from "Associated Graph Templates" dropdown in device screen th new arista templates "Arista_Chassis_Fan_ogi", * "Arista_Chassis_Power_ogi" and "Arista_Chassis_Temp_ogi". Click create graph , select some or all arista templates and click create graph.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
